protein.specific_function: Involved in pH regulation to eliminate acids generated by active metabolism or to counter adverse environmental conditions. Major proton extruding system driven by the inward sodium ion chemical gradient. Plays an important role in signal transduction

go_class.description: monovalent inorganic cation transmembrane transporter activity
